org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.storage
Class AeRestoreImplState

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.storage.AeRestoreImplState
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeImplStateNames
public class AeRestoreImplState
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeImplStateNames

Restores the state of BPEL implementation objects as saved by AeProcessImplState.
